resources.string: Due to a technical problem, verification operation is not completed. Please try again later.
You can verify barcoded documents created through the e-Government Gateway.
You can verify your document by reading the qr code on your document using your device\'s camera or by entering the information on your document.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
There is an error in your internet connection.
Are you sure that you want to logout?
You will leave the e-Devlet application and will be redirected to another web page. Responsibility of the quality of service and content is under the relevant institution.
You have to give the app permission to use the camera to be able to take pictures
Please grant storage permission to select images
Allow access external storage to select images
Failed to create Camera image file
There is no viewer application on your device to open %s extension files. Please install a viewer application from application markets to view this type file
There is no Excel viewer application on your device. Please install an Excel viewer application from application markets to view the Excel file
Due to a technical problem, adding to favorites is not completed
Enter the verification code sent to your phone number.
Visit the website of Atatürk Research Center.
You can verify the barcoded documents you receive through e-Government.
You can access e-services where you can create barcoded documents.
You can create an accident report and view the reports you have already created.
Select your cities and list e-services specific to your city.
You can access the most asked questions.
Access your billing and subscription information in companies
e-Services and contact information of official Institutions
e-Services and contact information of Municipalities
FastAdapter, the bullet proof, fast and easy to use adapter library, which minimizes developing time to a fraction...
Your device must have a map application.
Enter the barcode number of the document you want to verify.
Switch to clock mode for the time input.
Switch to text input mode for the time input.
You can select up to 5 cities.
You must choose at least one city.
The accident description must be more than 20 characters.
You must determine the accident location.

* Your current location information has been added as the location where the accident occurred, you can change the location with a change of 100m in diameter with the location detected by your device.
Your photo size cannot be larger than 5 MB
* If you do not agree to this condition, you cannot continue with the transaction.
I accept the above clarification text.
If you do accept the above clarification text, you cannot continue with the transaction.
You can continue with your transaction after the owner of the report you have matched completes and approves the report.

According to the Highway Traffic Law No. 2918, Highway Traffic Regulations and Circular No. 2017/18 on Accident Reports to be Filled by the Parties in Traffic Accidents Resulting in Material Damage Alone, you can create a report if the following conditions are VALID.
You must select the first hit point.
Please select the point where your vehicle was first hit.

I accept and undertake that all personal data I have entered belonging to the license holder for the creation of an Accident Report with SBM are correct and that I am responsible for all damages arising from any false statement.
If you do accept the above consent text, you cannot continue with the transaction.
Please fill in all fields in the form.
If the vehicle you were in an accident with is not registered to you, continue by scanning your vehicle licence qr or entering necessary information.
FILL IN THE INFORMATION AS A FORM
You can identify it by scanning the QR code on your vehicle license or by filling in the information.
SCAN QR CODE OF VEHICLE LICENCE
Your information registered in the system is given below. Please select the vehicle involved in the accident and continue your process.
Use the Create New Report button to create a new accident report.
To be included in a created report, use the Include in New Report button.
An error occurred while retrieving your device\'s location information. Please try again later.
Your device\'s location setting must be on for this operation.
You can see the information about the reports you have created before, started to create in the last 3 hours or the reports you are involved in from the My Reports screen.
You cannot select a point outside the circle on the screen.
You must add a minimum of 4 and a maximum of 8 photos.
* You must add a minimum of 4 and a maximum of 8 photos.
You can add information about the accident on this page.
PHOTOS, LOCATION AND DESCRIPTION OF ACCIDENT
The information of the accident report that you have matched with the QR code is as follows. Continue by checking.
In order for your accident information to be included in the accident report process, the following QR code must be scanned by the person or driver initiating the report creation process.
After the QR code is scanned by the other driver, you will be directed to the relevant page.
You can go to the next screen by checking the QR code scanning status.
ACCIDENT REPORT QR CODE FOR YOUR VEHICLE
GET INVOLVED IN THE ACCIDENT REPORT
There is no vehicle registered in your name in the system. You can add information about the vehicle involved in the accident using the ADD VEHICLE button.
The accident report service is available for accidents involving 2 vehicles.
Number of Vehicles Involved in Accidents
One of the parties of the accident makes the report with the CREATE NEW RECORD button and the other party makes the report with the INCLUDE IN RECORD button.
The report must be completed at the scene and you must have access to location information from your mobile device.
An accident report is equivalent to a paper accident report and is a legal document. Accident report procedures are performed according to the following information.
To use the Accident Reporting service, two-factor authentication must be enabled.

Your operation is in progress, please keep waiting… Due to the high demand for the service you are currently using, your operation has been queued. Your operation result will be automatically displayed shortly.
Your photo is being prepared, please wait.
Your policy information registered in the system is given below.
Navigating back will take you to the home page. You can access the report from the My Reports page when you need it.
Review the accident scenario and location information. You cannot edit the report after you approve it. Confirm the report to proceed.
You must complete the accident scenario step to create a report.

When you create the report, the information will be sent to SBM (Insurance Information and Surveillance Center) systems, which is the relevant institution. PLEASE NOTE THAT THE ACCIDENT REPORT YOU WILL SEND IS A LEGAL DOCUMENT!
The preview of your accident report is as follows. You can complete the report approval process by reviewing the information.
You can continue by scanning the information of your accident report with the QR code created by the other vehicle owner and matching your information.
SCAN THE CREATED ACCIDENT REPORT QR CODE
Your transaction could not be completed due to a technical failure experienced by the institution.
You do not have any completed report
You do not have any in progress report
* You can view the reports that have started to be created as draft for 3 hours in the system.

Your report numbered %s has been created and sent to the systems of the Insurance Information and Surveillance Center (SBM), the relevant institution. You can access the details of your report from the My Reports tab on the My Reports page.

Your report numbered %s has been created and sent to the systems of the Insurance Information and Surveillance Center (SBM), the relevant institution. You can access the details of your report from the My Reports tab on the My Reports page.
Your accident report has been created
* If you have an accident with a vehicle other than the one registered in the system, you can continue by adding different vehicle.
If you are having trouble scanning your identity card, you can add your information using the form.
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
Your device does not support NFC
Please turn NFC on from settings of your device
In order to be able to verification by ID card, you need to enable NFC permission in the Other Permissions section in the settings of the e-Government application on Xiaomi branded devices.
There is no content for this page. Please try again later.
You can add the service to your favorites by clicking the star button on the service lists or on the service screen.
The login page could not be opened due to a technical problem in the system. Please try again later
You must have a PDF reader application on your device to view the PDF file.
Please scan the back of your identity card by framing it.
You can fill in your card information using the form.
If you are having trouble scanning your identity card, you can add your information using the form.
What is an verified phone number?
You can use the Continue button to end the process. If you have completed the payment process, you can use the instructions on the page to see the results page.
In this service, you must give the e-Devlet application bluetooth permission from the settings of your device in order to connect bluetooth devices.
In this service, you must give bluetooth permission to connect bluetooth devices.
Camera permission is needed to take a picture. Please allow permission from Settings > Permissions.
In this service, you must allow the e-Devlet application to use the camera of your device in order to scan operations.
In this service, you must allow the e-Devlet application to use the camera of your device in order to scan operations.
You must allow the e-Devlet application to use the camera of your device in order to scan operations.
In this service, you must give the e-Devlet application location permission from the settings of your device in order to perform location operations.
In this service, you must give location permission to perform location operations.
In order to receive service notifications from e-Government Gateway and to ask for your approval for some transactions such as two-factor authentication, you need to provide notification permission.
In this service, you must give the e-Devlet application permission to use the storage of the e-Devlet application from the settings of your device in order to perform file operations.
In this service, you must allow the e-Devlet application to use the storage of your device in order to perform file operations.
Would you like to call the e-Government Call Center ALO 160?
Check your information below and start scanning your ID card.
You can make your account more secure by enabling the two-factor authentication feature.
Protect Your Account with Two-Factor Authentication
In order to benefit from e-Government Gateway notifications and complete the password renewal without going to PTT, you must have a verified email.
Verify Phone Number By ID Card
What is an verified phone number?
In order to benefit from e-Government Gateway notifications and complete the password renewal without going to PTT, you must have a phone number verified by SMS.
This information has been received from T.C. Nüfus ve Vatandaşlık İşleri (NVİ). If your information is wrong, click \"REFRESH\" button or go to the NVİ office.
Due to a technical problem, refresh operation is not completed
Are you sure that you want to logout?
Verified By SMS and Identity Card
Unverified By SMS and Identity Card
Please do not move your card.
Your card has been successfully scanned
Your transaction could not be completed.
Make sure that you enter your identity information correctly.
Make sure that you do not move the ID card and the device during scanning.
Be sure to verify with the identity card of the e-Government Gateway account holder that you initiated the transaction with.
NFC detection area of the devices varies depending on the brand and model. Try again by touching your ID card to different places on the middle and upper parts of the back of the device.
If you are using a device cover that can prevent the contact between your ID card and your device, remove your cover and try again.

Please apply to the General Directorate of Population and Citizenship Affairs, if you can not scan successfully even though you have done the above steps and you think there is a problem with your chip ID card.
If You Have Problems Scanning Your ID Card
You will leave the e-Devlet application and will be redirected to another web page. Responsibility of the quality of service and content is under the relevant institution
Your verified phone number has been updated. Your SIM is active.
Verified phone number process has been completed successfully.
Verified phone number process has been completed successfully. You can continue your transactions via the e-Government Gateway web or mobile application.
Your phone number has been updated successfully.
No results were found for your criteria.
The service is not accessible due to a technical problem.
Show images only when connected to wireless networks (WIFI)
Since you entered the verification code incorrectly, you need to start your transaction again.
Verification code has been sent to phone number %s
Verification code has been sent to your registered phone number
You could not complete the operation within the specified time. To complete verification, you can get a verification code again to phone number %s
You could not complete the operation within the specified time. You can get a verification code again to complete verification.
Service has been removed from your favorite list
Fill the form below with the information of your identity card. Or you can fill the form automatically by scanning the back of your identity card using the camera via the camera icon on the side.
Touch your ID card to your device as described below and start scanning.
* NFC detection area of the devices depends on the brand and model and is usually located on the back-top of the device.
Touch your ID card to the back of your device as described below.
You can verify with your identity card. If you do not have an identity card, you can click the info button in the top corner to see other verification methods.
Application market is not found in your device
Both input and output Uri must be specified
Therefore, override color resource (ucrop_color_toolbar_widget) in your app to make it work on pre-L devices
Due to a technical problem, removing from favorites is not completed
Please enter a valid barcode number.
Please enter a valid verification code.
You can log in to your e-Government Gateway account more securely by turning on the two-factor authentication.
The institution does not have location information.
The institution does not have phone number information.
The institution does not have web page information.
Due to a technical problem, e-service is not accessible
The file download and viewing process is not completed. Please try again later.
Your device must have a web browser application.
